lead_paragraph: NUSSBAUM--Pauline. October 10, 1922 - April 26, 2016. Died peacefully at home in NYC. USMC WWll Sgt. Widow of Morris Nussbaum. Leaves behind daughter Suzy and loving grandsons Max and Austin Gengos. 1/3
